mapper.sql: id, wx_code AS wxCode, interface_token AS interfaceToken, web_auth_token AS webAuthToken, web_auth_refresh AS webAuthRefreshToken, jsapi_ticket AS jsApiTicket, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_token( wx_code, interface_token, web_auth_token, web_auth_refresh, jsapi_ticket, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{wxCode}, #{interfaceToken}, #{webAuthToken}, #{webAuthRefreshToken}, #{jsApiTicket}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE wx_code=VALUES(wx_code), interface_token=VALUES(interface_token), web_auth_token=VALUES(web_auth_token), web_auth_refresh=VALUES(web_auth_refresh), jsapi_ticket=VALUES(jsapi_ticket), update_time=now()
